name: bg8-one-page-checkout
description: Converts WooCommerce checkout into a 3-step, single-column, accessible stepper with brand styling, pre-paint overlay, and improved UX. Includes admin configuration for colors and labels.

scripts.release: npm run deploy && git add . && git commit -m 'Release v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")' && git push
scripts.test: php -l bg8-one-page-checkout.php && php -l includes/class-bg8-one-page-checkout.php && php -l includes/class-bg8-admin.php

author: Blackgate <https://blackgate.com.au>
